text: int main ( ) { int n ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int rows , i , j , l , * * x , k , var ; for ( l = 0 ; l < n ; l ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & rows ) ; x = ( int * * ) malloc ( rows * sizeof ( int * ) ) ; for ( j = 1 ; j <= rows ; j ++ ) { x [ j - 1 ] = ( int * ) malloc ( j * sizeof ( int ) ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < rows ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & var ) ; x [ i ] [ j ] = var ; } } for ( i = rows - 2 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { for ( k = 0 ; k <= i ; k ++ ) { if ( x [ i + 1 ] [ k ] > x [ i + 1 ] [ k + 1 ] ) { x [ i ] [ k ] += x [ i + 1 ] [ k ] ; } else { x [ i ] [ k ] += x [ i + 1 ] [ k + 1 ] ; } } } printf ( "%d\n" , x [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; for ( j = 1 ; j <= rows ; j ++ ) { free ( x [ j - 1 ] ) ; } free ( x ) ; } return 0 ; }
